0.description: You walk through the dungeon, a dark place tainted by evil intent. You stare at the mysterious dark splatters on the stone and smell the copper and iron in the air.

1.description: The room is large and rectangular with a giant stone staircase that spirals down into the darkness.

2.description: The room is made out of strange looking stone. There is a single well in the center of it.

3.description: The room is very dark, and you can see barely more than a few feet in front. You hear a low growl nearby.

4.description: On the other side of the room is a room with nothing but a large, empty coffin and next to it, a spiral staircase.

5.description: There is a large hole in the ground. The dungeon walls are very damp and there is water leaking from the ceiling.

6.description: You enter a room with bones littered across the floor, a broken statue in the middle of the floor and a single exit.

7.description: You walk down a dark passageway with tunnels on both sides. You see a rat scurry across the passage.

8.description: The room has no light except that given by the torches that are placed along the wall. You see a large shadow looming up ahead.

9.description: You are in a large dungeon room. The walls are decorated with paintings of mysterious figures.

10.description: The room is circular and about twenty feet across. A deep moat of water with a bridge. The smell of mold is omnipresent.

11.description: You find yourself in a large, dank room. The air is thick with the smell of death and rottenness.

12.description: The room is very dark, and you can see barely more than a few feet in front. You hear a low growl nearby.

13.description: You walk into a room where you see a large symbol on the floor with strange symbols in the center. You hear some echoes in the distance.

14.description: You walk into a dimly lit room with many chains and shackles hanging from the ceiling. You hear a rattling sound as you enter..

15.description: The room is a large cave area, stalactites hang from the ceiling, there is a large crack in the ground.

16.description: You are in a dark room. A window is above you, letting bright sunlight into the dark room. There are odd designs on the floor.

17.description: You enter a brightly lit room. There is a red metal door that is surprisingly large. It must lead to a great treasure, or possibly a great danger.

18.description: The room has a small stream of water running down one wall. An odd greenish glow emanates from the walls.

19.description: Bright light enters the dungeon room, emanating from a rectangular hole in the ceiling. Faint cries for help can be heard.

20.description: There is a large table in the room. On it sits a large book and a goblet. The book appears to have no title, while the goblet bears the King's crest.

21.description: The room smells foul, and dark corners seem to lurk around every corner. You hear a bunch of whispers.

22.description: You walk into the room, and you are overcome with a sense of dread. The wooden floor creaks and moans, and the ceiling sways in and out with each breath you take.

23.description: You walk into a room decorated to look like a swamp. The walls are water based, with small cypress trees growing out of the water.

24.description: You find yourself in a cylindrical room, lit by a red light which you suspect comes from deep in the walls.

25.description: You walk down a long chute of rings, descending into the under-ground. You are in a room filled with large menacing statues.

26.description: The room is dark, as your torch provides the only light. You see piles of bones and a large dragon skull in the center of the room.

27.description: The room is made out of solid black stone, it's not even decorated, though the walls do have faint designs along them, almost like ancient runes.

28.description: The dungeon room is large and dark. Red and black torches line the walls. A large rock in the center of the room feeds an active volcano in the distance. The ground is almost entirely made from lava.

29.description: You enter a room that is large and elaborate. Huge statues of giant beasts surround the room and strange symbols cover the walls. You have a feeling that this is the final room.
